name: todo_write
description:
Manage the task list for planning and tracking work.

Use this tool to:
- Create an implementation plan (list of pending tasks for another tier to execute)
- Track progress on a multi-step task you are executing

When planning for another tier, leave all items as `pending` â€” the executing tier marks progress.

When executing, mark the current item `in_progress` before starting and `completed` after finishing. Only ONE item `in_progress` at a time.

Task states:
- pending: Not started yet
- in_progress: Currently working on (only ONE at a time)
- completed: Finished successfully

Use imperative form for content ("Fix bug") and active form for display ("Fixing bug").
